sentences.sContent: The government has just repealed the law segregating public facilities.
sentences.sCn: 政府刚刚废除了隔离公共设施的法令。

synos.tran: 废除；撤销；废止；放弃；否定

remMethod.val: re(反) + peal(=call叫) → 叫回 → 废除

trans.tranCn: 废止, 撤销, 否定, 放弃, 废除
trans.tranOther: if a government repeals a law, it officially ends that law
